title: New Year’s Eve Package
seo_title: New Year’s Eve Package | WestHouse Hotel
seo_description: Ring in 2018 in the heart of Manhattan. WestHouse is at the epicenter of the festivities, being only minutes away from the world-famous ball drop in the city that never sleeps.
short_description: Celebrate New Year’s Eve in the Heart of New York City. Read more to see what the package includes.
contents:
Celebrate New Year’s Eve in the Heart of New York City

Ring in 2018 in the heart of Manhattan. WestHouse is at the epicenter of the festivities, being only minutes away from the world-famous ball drop in the city that never sleeps. Whether you crave a crazy night out or prefer an intimate night in, WestHouse has the ultimate package for you to celebrate the new year. Featuring all the amenities needed to pregame before hitting the town or to host a quiet and cozy in-room fête, Westhouse has you covered with a magical weekend getaway.

The New Years' Eve Celebration Package includes:

  • Party favors
  • Bottle of champagne
  • Bottle of red wine
  • Chocolate covered strawberries from Godiva
  • Watch the ball drop in The Den, the hotel’s modern interpretation of a classic speakeasy
  • In-room blowout (1) and makeup application (1) by our partner NOMI Beauty

Terms and conditions:

  • 3-night minimum
  • Stay dates: December 29th to January 3rd
  • Room type: Times Square View King or Suites
  • Book by December 28th
  • Non-refundable
